isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - VALVE COVER/GASKET (I-6 WITH DIAMOND LOGIC), REPLACE

wtsproc.wtsdescrip: VALVE COVER/GASKET (I-6 WITH DIAMOND LOGIC), REPLACE
wtsproc.config: New computer design, mounted on left side of engine

step1.para: Chock wheels. Open hood.
Disconnect batteries.
Disconnect both wire harness connections at computer.
Remove computer from support bracket.
Remove both charge air cooler pipes for access; include air compressor hose at pipe.
Disconnect wire harness for access to computer support bracket.
Remove computer support bracket.
Remove engine cover in cab.
Remove upper radiator support strut rods.
Remove serpentine belt.
Remove belt tensioner.
Disconnect A/C clutch wire, A/C compressor line hose clamps at alternator bracket, and bolts retaining A/C compressor. Reposition A/C compressor and secure for access.
Remove A/C compressor bracket.
Disconnect wire harness at alternator harness support bracket/clamps and connections at sensors. Reposition wire harness.
Disconnect air compressor hose at air filter assembly.
Disconnect internal injector wire harness at valve cover.
Remove crankcase breather tube from engine.
Remove valve/air box cover and/or gasket.
Connect internal injector wire inside valve cover. Install cover/gasket.
Install bolts retaining valve cover and torque to specification.
Install crankcase breather tube.
Connect air compressor hose to air filter assembly.
Install wire to alternator harness support bracket, also connections at sensors.
Install A/C compressor bracket and torque to specifications.
Install A/C compressor to bracket. Connect clutch wire and hose clamps.
Install belt tensioner. Torque to specifications.
Install serpentine belt.
Install upper radiator support strut rods.
Install engine cover.
Install computer support bracket.
Connect wire harness to valve cover.
Install computer.
Connect wire harness to computer.
Install both charge air pipes, include air compressor hose.
Connect battery.
Start engine and check for leaks.
Close hood and remove wheel chocks.
